name: Dream SMP: Las Nevadas Bedrock
description:
The Dream SMP is an invite-only survival multiplayer Minecraft server. Created by YouTubers Dream and GeorgeNotFound, it features them and other Minecraft content creators who roleplay as fictionalised versions of themselves within a loose overarching storyline

This is The Las Nevadas Update featuring new locations like Las Nevadas and a completed version of Snowchester
